channel.title: Synysterpvp | 6 gb ram | raiding | giants | guns | ranks
channel.description:
Synyster PvP IP: 199.241.185.43:29921
http://i38.tinypic.com/153y8f8.jpg
About the Server On this PvP server you can earn money doing various things around the server. You can earn money from killing monsters. We have a special plugin that allows giants to spawn naturally in the wild. Kill them for big cash, but be careful, they are deadly. You can also sell items in the shop which you can use to buy other items from the shop. There are multiple ranks that you can earn in game. We have also added an arena where you can battle other players using fully automatic assault rifles with color colored armor. This server will be constantly evolving based off of player feedback. We would love to hear from you so do not hesitate to reply to this post with any suggestions or requests.
Features PvP Raiding Griefing Mcmmo City Shop Rank System Rentable Houses Heads for Killing players Money for killing mobs Guns Giants Chairs you can sit in Much More
Player Made Videos
Earn Money By Inviting Players!
Each player that you invite to the server will net you $5,000 when they earn Member+ Rank!
Staff
Senior Administrator
Synyster_Rain
Administrators
ImTheMsterChef
Moderators
Hawkmaster123 Emazed
We are accepting Moderator applications, however, no administrators are needed at this time.
To apply for staff simply Fill out this form:
Username: Rank: Time Spent on the server: Minecraft Experience: Moderation Experience: Why do you want to be a moderator?
Why did you choose our server?
Are you Staff on any other servers right now?
How much time can you be on a day?
Are you recommended to be a moderator by anybody else on the server?
Donations
Iron Package $5
Gold Package $10
RedStone Package $20
Diamond Package $30
Obsidian Package $40
Emerald Package $50
Legendary Package $75
Synyster Package $100
Package Details are listed on the server.
Additional money and xp packs can be purchased ranging from $1 to $15
Total Server Donations $232.00

lop3z69 - $100 visionofglory - $35 Hawkmaster123 - $30 TerraPhreak - $20 techmullet - $20 darkshad196 - $14 Unified_Monsta - $10 clock12345 - $2 Emazed - $1
